directions: Mix together 1/3 cup peanut butter, corn syrup, and rice cereal. Pat into the bottom of two 9-inch pie plates.
Mix softened ice cream with 1/4 cup peanut butter. Spread into the crusts. Freeze until firm, about 1 hour. Drizzle with chocolate syrup before serving.
ingredients: 1/2 cup chocolate syrup, or to taste
title: Krispy Cream Pie
